keyMoments.title: Saved from Eric's Ultimate Attack
keyMoments.description: Usopp quickly reacts to save Apis from Eric's Kama Kama no Kamaitachi Midareuchi attack, demonstrating the crew's protective nature toward her.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the bond between Apis and the Straw Hat crew as they protect her from mortal danger.

keyMoments.title: Apis Chooses to Stay on Warship Island
keyMoments.description: Apis makes the mature decision to remain on Warship Island to protect the Dragon's Nest rather than join the Straw Hat crew on their journey to the Grand Line.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Apis's growth from a frightened child to a responsible guardian committed to protecting the dragons and her home. Provides closure to her character arc in the Warship Island story.

abilities.description: The Hiso Hiso no Mi grants Apis the ability to telepathically communicate with animals.

relationships.description: Apis befriended the Straw Hat crew during the Warship Island Arc. Though she parts ways with them in this episode, they remain friends.

evolutionMoments.description: Apis says farewell to Luffy and the crew as they depart for the Grand Line.

keyMoments.title: Eric Betrays Nelson
keyMoments.description: After Nelson's defeat, Eric swiftly attacks and slashes his former employer, revealing he planned all along to monopolize the dragon bone elixir for himself.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Eric's true nature as completely self-serving and demonstrates he was the real main antagonist all along, not just a henchman.

keyMoments.title: Ultimate Technique: Kama Kama no Kamaitachi Midareuchi
keyMoments.description: Eric unleashes his most powerful attack, releasing multiple air blades followed by a whirlwind of razor air capable of slicing through solid rock.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the full extent of Eric's Devil Fruit powers before his final defeat.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Luffy defeats Eric decisively using Gomu Gomu no Pistol and Gomu Gomu no Kane, sending him flying into the distance.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Eric's defeat and the end of his role as the Warship Island Arc's antagonist.

keyMoments.title: Tricked by Nami and Falls into the Sea
keyMoments.description: When Eric attempts a final revenge attack, Nami outsmarts him by claiming there's Dragonite beside him. He falls for the trick, and Nami kicks his leg, causing him to fall into the treacherous currents near Reverse Mountain.
keyMoments.significance: Permanently removes Eric as a threat and demonstrates Nami's tactical intelligence.

statusHistory.reason: Fell into the treacherous currents near Reverse Mountain; fate unknown

abilities.description: Eric releases a powerful air blade that slashes the enemy multiple times upon contact, strong enough to slice through rock.
Eric releases a single small air blade that is still powerful enough to slice through rock.
Eric's ultimate technique - he slashes many times, releasing multiple air blades toward the enemy before unleashing a powerful whirlwind of razor air that can effortlessly slice through solid rock.

relationships.description: Eric worked as a mercenary for Nelson but secretly planned to betray him and monopolize the dragon bone elixir.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric attacks and slashes Nelson after his defeat, revealing his betrayal.

relationships.description: Eric fought against Luffy and the Straw Hats throughout the Warship Island Arc.

evolutionMoments.description: Luffy defeats Eric in their final battle.

reveals.information: Eric planned all along to betray Nelson and monopolize the dragon bone elixir for himself

name.japanese: ネルソン・ロワイヤル

keyMoments.title: Betrayed and Attacked by Eric
keyMoments.description: After his defeat, Nelson is swiftly attacked and slashed by his former mercenary Eric, who reveals his plan to monopolize the dragon bone elixir.
keyMoments.significance: Nelson's betrayal by Eric demonstrates the consequences of relying on corrupt mercenaries and marks his effective removal from the story.

relationships.description: Nelson hired Eric as a mercenary to help capture the Sennenryu, but Eric secretly planned to betray him.

evolutionMoments.description: Eric attacks Nelson after his defeat, revealing his betrayal.
